release.note: Preparing for public release of source code. Making the VS project work without dependencies, adding docs, etc

Added a copy of the "FindComboBox" to the search results pad. This uses the accelerator key :kbd:`Alt-Q`. I have found this convenient to use for quick searches. Hit :kbd:`Alt-q`, type search term and hit enter to find and then hit :kbd:`Escape` **twice** to return focus to the text editor.
